name: Disconnected (Loïc da Silva, Star5lash, HeuR, Nighked, Thea.Trevignon, nahkriid)
name_original: Disconnected (Loïc da Silva, Star5lash, HeuR, Nighked, Thea.Trevignon, nahkriid)
description:
At the party, everyone is having fun. They dance, they laugh, they drink... And while music is loud, a tiny sound can barely be heard. That is the sound of your voice.

Enjoy this evening and... Party like there's no tomorrow.

Game created for the ENJAM 2019

Theme : Party like there's no tomorrow • Time : 5 days

Loïc da Silva : Game Design & Narrative Design

Pierre-Henri Heurté : Game Design, Narrative Design & Programming

Clément Patricio : Programming

Kévin Gouesnard : Game Art

Téo Salvi : Game Art

Terry Perez--Gervais : Music & Sound Design

Théa Trévignon : Project Management
